response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $15,000, aiming to make this opportunity more accessible to you while ensuring a fair return for us. We trust that you will find the product invaluable and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
